DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect two different physical exercise protocol change coronary artery plaque composition development in-stent restenosis patient treat percutaneous coronary intervention stent implantation . The investigator compare aerobic interval training moderate continuous training . Both exercise protocols duration 12 week . The investigator hypothesize aerobic interval training superior moderate continuous train regard effect composition coronary artery plaque reduction development in-stent restenosis .
DOC.brief_title: Physical Exercise Coronary Artery Plaque Composition
DOC.criteria: stable unstable coronary artery disease treat percutaneous coronary intervention stent implantation , inform patient consent STelevation myocardial infarction , inability give inform consent , inability participate regular training due residency , work situation comorbidity , know chronic inflammatory disease atherosclerosis , plan surgery within next four month
